mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM BASICBOARD.TBL_REPLY WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASICBOARD.TBL_REPLY(BNO, REPLYTEXT, REPLYER) VALUES (#{bno},#{replytext},#{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE BASICBOARD.TBL_REPLY SET REPLYTEXT = #{replytext}, UPDATEDATE = now() WHERE RNO = #{rno}
